overview: After policeman Frank Dooley is framed for theft and loses his job on the force, he joins a security guard agency and teams up with inept former defense lawyer Norman Kane. When the two botch a job guarding a local warehouse, they begin to uncover corruption within the company and their union.
tagline: Undercover. Overdressed. And keeping you safe from the scum of the earth.
cast: John Candy|Eugene Levy|Robert Loggia|Kenneth McMillan|Meg Ryan
